ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: You can find a very comprehensive list of failed attempts at master fulcrums site... the gemcutter is quite comprehensive.  I dont believe anyone has attempted
ygData.messageBody:
You can find a very comprehensive list of failed attempts at master fulcrums
site... the gemcutter is quite comprehensive. I dont believe anyone has
attempted a gemcutter and a metal bar alone however, but it seems like a
long shot to me.

Cogg - RZ

Master Fulcrums site - http://www.eqportal.com/tinkering/



----- Original Message -----
From: Eric Baker <ericb76@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 27, 2000 11:00 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter ideas


> Here's just a couple of thoughts I had last night. Keep in mind it was 4AM
> and I was running on nothing but Mountain Dew so if they sound ridiculous
> please forgive me. :)
>
> 1. Has anyone tried right clicking the gemcutter on a metal bar? I know
it
> doesn't make any sense to use something called a GEM cutter on a metal
bar,
> but this is Verant we're talking about after all.
>
> 2. An expensive possibility but has anyone tried putting a gemcutter and
a
> gem(probably a pearl judging by the recipe book) in a jeweler's kit
without
> a metal bar and seeing what happens?
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Buy Long Distance with your GROUP and SAVE!!!
> http://click.egroups.com/1/4123/0/_/444587/_/959450499/
